DataElement.preferredName: Stratification Criterion Observation Reuse Template Study Activity Status Date and Time ISO21090.TS.DATETIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An activity defined at a global library level that identifies pre-treatment factors by which study subjects are segregated to assure balance of these factors before randomization to a study arm or some smaller segment of a study. The decisive factor used to help segregate the study subject into a stratum group. The date (and time) on which the status is assigned to the activity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Stratification Criterion Observation Reuse Template Study Activity Status Date and Time
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The process of classifying patients into a sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.:That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._A condition or state at a particular time.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Stratification Criterion Observation Reuse Template Study Activity
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The process of classifying patients into a sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.:That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: The process of classifying patients into a sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.
That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.
Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.:An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains TS so that it's precision can not be more precise than seconds.
